related_post.text: No I want the page to display conditional information depending upon whether the user is logged in not restrict the entire view due to a user not being logged in.

so_post.text: that wouldn't be a backend thing it would be a frontend one. here's a stackoverflow post about it: https://stackoverflow.com/questions/43043113/howtoforcereloadingapagewhenusingbrowserbackbutton

comments: id say this is a related info because it doesn't provide a direct solution to the user's issue
